name: Class BasicTreeUI.MouseInputHandler
text:
MouseInputHandler handles passing all mouse events,
 including mouse motion events, until the mouse is released to
 the destination it is constructed with. It is assumed all the
 events are currently target at source.
codes:
public class BasicTreeUI.MouseInputHandler
extends Object
implements MouseInputListener

fields.description: Source that events are coming from.

methods.description: Removes an event from the source.
